description:
The battle to save Earth is on, and Kyoya’s pulling out all the stops. Will his incredible Aqulta Gwaneff, A.K.A The Sword of Truth, be too much for Gao to handle? Or will the Mighty Sun Fighter overcome the odds and save the planet from a monster invasion?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 放て! フューチャーカード!!
